name: tm15
effect: Teaches Hyper Beam to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Hyper Beam to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can’t move on the next turn.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.
